snippet.title: Land of Screens - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
When Holland's social media is lit ablaze by a recent breakup, she embarks on a new mission to ditch the social media saturation and discover some real-world relationships among a Land of Screens.

Wishlist Now on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1271260

In Land of Screens, guide Holland on a new journey to rediscover the analog world with the help of a few new friends, some synthy chiptune jams, and the inimitable chemistry of small children and adorable animals.

Website: https://serenityforge.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SerenityForge
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SerenityForge
